ComicInfo.Summary:
"THE OMEGA TATTOO"
Someone is using The Marked magic for their own purposes. Some seemingly good, some definitely not. The Marked must track down the source. Is it a Marked turned rogue or something much more dangerous?
*Chapter Titles* Chapter 1: Back in Black Chapter 2: The Return of the Queen Chapter 3: Snips and Snails and Puppy Dog Tails Chapter 4: Darkness Chapter 5: Something Wicked Epilogue *List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Brian Haberlin & Geirrod Van Dyke | 1 | | B | Cover B | Brian Haberlin & Geirrod Van Dyke | 2 | | C | Cover C | Brian Haberlin & Geirrod Van Dyke | 3 |
ComicInfo.Title: The Omega Tattoo
